Contact Details: Welsh Government Cathays Park, Cardiff CF10 3NQ Tele 0300 0604400 Mon-Fri, 8:30am to 5pm Email customerhelp@gov.wales
Description: An annual report which presents data on individual pupils receiving education outside of school, including Pupil Referral Units, which includes data by age, gender and the type of provision.
Name: Educated other than at school
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified by accessing Power BI links listed under the heading Educated other than at school (EOTAS).
Sizing Notes: One page relates to Special Educational Needs (SEN). If Power BI-Available through the odata route, so simple to get, but may need a number of separate downloads / produce a number of different datasets, so needs a fair amount of up-front analysis.
